Miles Sound System SDK 6.1c

AIL_3D_sample_distances

The function AIL_3D_sample_distances returns the current minimum and maximum distances for the specified sample handle.

void AIL_3D_sample_distances(
  H3DSAMPLE S,
  F32 *max_dist,
  F32 *min_dist
);

In Parameters

S
indicates the sample handle to query.

Out Parameters

max_dist
returns the current maximum front distance setting.
min_dist
returns the current minimum front distance setting.

Discussion

You can pass NULL for any value that you're not interested in.
